name: Clairvoyance
description: Both players reveal their hands

name: Seek scriptures
description: Search your deck for up to 2 Incantations...

name: Detect evil and good
description: Your opponent reveals all cards of Holy or Dark affinities in their hand

name: Protection from evil and good
description: You get no damage from sources of Holy or Dark affinities during Showdown Phase this round

name: Augury
description: Reveal the top 3 cards from your deck and put them back in the order of your choice

name: Borrowed knowledge
description: Draw 3 cards then discard 1 card

name: Warding bubble
description: You get no damage from sources of Fire and Water affinities during Showdown Phase this round

name: Dust shield
description: You get no damage from sources of Earth and Wind affinities during Showdown Phase this round

name: Nature's boon
description: You get no damage from sources of Earth, Wind and Water affinities but get double damage from sources of Fire affinity during Showdown Phase this round

name: Wrath of the elements
description: All your and your opponent's damage from sources of Fire, Water, Earth and Wind affinities have +2 to their original value during Showdown Phase

name: Infuse life
description: Gain 5 life points. Reveal a card with a Holy affinity from your hand to gain 3 more life points

name: Whisper of hope
description: Draw 1 card. Gain 2 life points

name: Daring exploration
description: Both players reveal their hands

name: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Landmark. Add all revealed cards in your hand and take 2 damage for each non-Landmark card added this way.
description: Both players reveal their hands

name: Guided exploration
description: Search your deck for a Landmark, reveal it and add it in your hand. Shuffle your deck

name: Gift of prosperity
description: Draw 2 cards

name: Gift of choice
description: Search your deck for a card, reveal it and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck

name: Gift of renewal
description: Return a card from your graveyard to your hand

name: Unearth scriptures
description: Return up to 2 Incantations from your graveyard to your hand

name: Reclaim ruins
description: Return up to 2 Landmarks from your graveyard to your hand
